contact.description: I'm open to new opportunities and projects. If you have a question, want to collaborate, or just want to talk tech over a coffee, write to me!

services.title: AI-Centered
services.description: I design and build production-ready AI systems, focusing on Generative AI, intelligent agents, and scalable architectures.
services.genai_desc: I build domain-specific LLM solutions, Agentic RAG architectures, and reliable AI pipelines designed for real-world applications.
services.agents_desc: I develop autonomous AI agents capable of tool usage, multi-step reasoning, and workflow orchestration for complex tasks.
services.backend_desc: I design scalable backend services and APIs that power AI systems, ensuring secure data flow and efficient model integration.
services.frontend_desc: I create modern, interactive interfaces that translate complex AI systems into intuitive user experiences.
